data.eml:eml: Contributions to the palaeofauna of Ptinidae (Coleptera) known from Baltic amber

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bukejs, Andris, Alekseev, Vitalii I., Cooper, David M. L., King, Gavin A., Mckellar, Ryan C. (2017): Contributions to the palaeofauna of Ptinidae (Coleptera) known from Baltic amber. Zootaxa 4344 (1): 181-188, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4344.1.12
